title: Special Mini Ep: Meet the Founders Behind Sparked at Ulta Beauty's Star Brands
itunes:title: Special Mini Ep: Meet the Founders Behind Sparked at Ulta Beauty's Star Brands
itunes:subtitle: In this bonus episode, we bring our burning beauty questions to founders Lauren Bosworth (of Love Wellness), Zoe Boiku (of Zoeva), Sharon Chuter (of Uoma Beauty), and Lilit Caradanian (of Elcie Cosmetics). We talk ab...
description:
In this bonus episode, we bring our burning beauty questions to founders Lauren Bosworth (of Love Wellness), Zoe Boiku (of Zoeva), Sharon Chuter (of Uoma Beauty), and Lilit Caradanian (of Elcie Cosmetics). We talk about everything from why feminine wellness is now A Thing, to the best way to apply foundation. This commercial-free podcast is produced in partnership with our friends at Ulta Beauty. They are dedicated to bringing up-and-coming brands to beauty lovers. Visit ulta.com/sparked to find out more and shop the Sparked at Ulta Beauty virtual experience. 

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
